content: उपच्छंद् {c10c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To wheedle, flatter, coax, entice, invite; जलेनोपच्छंदितः <ls>Ś. 5</ls> coaxed to drink water; परदारानुपच्छंदयति <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--2@} To conciliate. {@--3@} To beseech, request; <ls>R. 5. 58.</ls> {@--4@} To persuade one to do a thing. {@--5@} To give one something.
